Class QuestionService

java.lang.Object
ch.quizinno.brainquest.services.QuestionService
@Service public class QuestionService extends Object
Service for managing questions.

  • Constructor Details

    • QuestionService

      public QuestionService(QuestionRepository questionRepository, TopicRepository topicRepository, AnswerService answerService, HighscoreService highscoreService, QuestionMapper questionMapper)
      Constructs a new QuestionService with the specified repositories and services.
      Parameters:
      questionRepository - the repository to manage questions
      topicRepository - the repository to manage topics
      answerService - the service to manage answers
      highscoreService - the service to manage highscores
      questionMapper - the mapper to map questions to DTOs
